name: Brumo
description:
Escape the spaceship you're on while dealing with an alien predator and a rogue AI that doesn't want anyone to get hurt.

Brumo was an exercise in prototyping a horror game, created in a month. 

Credits:

Massimo Gauthier - Programming and Writing

Alex Laliberté-Mercier - Game Design

Jeremy Dumont - Sound Design and UI Design

Tay Nelson - Art

Nate Gibbs Remenda - Additional Art
